relevant_findings.HEENT: Pupils equal, round, reactive to light; Extraocular movements intact; Anicteric sclerae; No conjunctival pallor; Mucous membranes dry; Oropharynx clear
relevant_findings.neck: Supple; No lymphadenopathy; No jugular venous distention
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Bradycardic; Regular rhythm; S1/S2 present; No murmurs, rubs, or gallops
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Unlabored breathing; Good air entry; Clear to auscultation bilaterally
relevant_findings.gastrointestinal: Soft abdomen; Normoactive bowel sounds; Non-distended; Epigastric and periumbilical tenderness; No organomegaly; No rigidity, guarding, or rebound tenderness
